hint.text: Subtract the remainder from the number and use long division method to find the square root.

solution.text:
We know that \(3833\) is not a perfect square because on performing long division we get the remainder as \(112\).
Subtracting \(112\) from \(3833\), we get,
\(3833-112=3721\)
Perform long division method to find square root of \(3721\) as shown below.
Therefore, the square root of \(3721\) is \(61\)

content.text: Find the square root of the perfect square.
